entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
